alert.note: Alert for Irion; Schleicher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 8:31PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Schleicher and southeastern Irion Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 831 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Us-190 Near The Crockett- Sutton County Line, or 14 miles east of Barnhart, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mertzon, Sherwood, The Intersection Of Us- 190 And Ranch Road 1828, Us-67 Near The Irion- Tom Green County Line and Us-190 Near The Crockett- Sutton County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
